title: 後
a: back, rear, after, later, the rest

title: あなた
a: you, dear (what a wife calls a husband)

title: 浴びる
a: to pour on oneself, to bathe in

title: あまり
a: not very (with negative sentence), not much

title: ある
a: to be (inanimate objects), to exist, to be located, to have, to possess, to take place

title: 言う
a: say, state, express, be said, be called, named

title: いくら
a: how much, how many, hardly any, not much, however~, no matter how~

title: 五日
a: the fifth of the month, five days

title: 五つ
a: five items, five years of age

title: 今
a: now, at present, just now, soon

title: 入れる
a: put in, add, send, include, prepare

title: 上
a: up, upward, above, top, higher, superior, older

title: 後
a: the back, the rear, behind, in back of

title: 上着
a: coat, suit jacket, upper garment, outerwear

title: 大勢
a: a great number of people, a crowd

title: 起きる
a: wake up, get up; be up, be awake; take place, occur;

title: お酒
a: liquor, alcoholic beverage; sake, Japanese rice wine

title: お手洗い
a: lavatory, rest room, Ladies' Room, Men's Room

title: おばさん
a: aunt; a middle-aged woman, a lady

title: 終わる
a: to end; to finish doing something

meta.specific: 時間がかかる - to take time
眼鏡をかける - to wear glasses
電話をかける - to make a call
残念がる - to feel sorry

title: 九日
a: nine days, ninth of the month

title: こちら
a: this person, this direction, this side, thereafter

title: 先
a: the future, priority, precedence, former, previous, old, late

meta.specific: 傘をさす - to raise umbrella

title: 丈夫
a: hero, gentleman, warrior, good health, robustness

title: 知る
a: to know, to understand, to be acquainted with, to feel

title: 吸う
a: to smoke, to breathe, to suck in

title: 少し
a: small quantity, little, few, little while, short distance

title: 住む
a: to abide, to reside, to live in, to inhabit, to dwell

title: そば
a: near, close, beside, vicinity, proximity, besides, while

meta.specific: 窓のそば - near the window

title: ~たち
a: (plural suffix) e.g. watashi = I; watashi-tachi = we

title: 頼む
a: to request, to beg, to ask

title: ~中
a: middle, during, in the midst of

title: ちょっと
a: just a minute, a short time, a while, just a little, somewhat, easily, readily, rather

title: 使う
a: to use, to handle, to manipulate, to employ, to need, to want, to spend, to consume

title: 作る
a: to make, to create, to manufacture, to draw up, to write, to compose, to build, to coin, to cultivate, to organize, to establish

title: 付ける
a: to attach, to join, to add, to append, to stick, to glue, to fasten, to furnish, to wear, to appraise, to bring alongside, to follow

title: 勤める
a: to serve, to fill a post, to work (for), to exert oneself, to endeavor, to be diligent

title: 出かける
a: to depart, to go out, to set out, to start

title: できる
a: to be able to, to be ready, to occur

meta.specific: 英語ができる - to be able to use English

title: 出る
a: to appear, to come forth, to leave

title: どうして
a: why?, for what reason, how, in what way, for what purpose, what for

title: どうも
a: thanks, how, (very) much, very, quite, really, somehow

title: 十日
a: ten days, the 10th of the month

title: 飛ぶ
a: to jump, to fly, to leap, to spring, to bound, to hop

title: 止まる
a: to stop, to come to a halt

title: 取る
a: to take, to pick up, to harvest, to earn, to choose

title: どれ
a: well, now, let me see, which (3 or more)

title: 鳴く
a: to bark, to purr, to make animal sound

title: 七日
a: seven days, the seventh day (of the month)

title: 並ぶ
a: to line up, to stand in a line

title: 並べる
a: to line up, to set up

title: 乗る
a: to get on, to ride in

title: はく
a: to wear, to put on (a sword)

title: 初めに
a: to begin with, first of all

title: 二十日
a: twenty days, twentieth (day of the month)

title: 晴れる
a: to be sunny, to clear away

title: 吹く
a: to blow (e.g. wind); to emit, to spout

title: 二日
a: second day of the month, two days

title: 欲しい
a: wanted, wished for, in need of, desired

meta.kana: まいげつ / まいつき
まいねん / まいとし

title: まずい
a: unappetising, unpleasant (taste, appearance, situation), ugly, unskilful

title: 三日
a: three days, the third day (of the month)

title: 六日
a: six days, the sixth day (of the month)

meta.specific: もう、帰りました - already did go home
もう一度 - one more time

title: 休む
a: to rest, to have a break

title: やる
a: to do, to give (to inferiors, animals, etc.), to send, to perform, to play, to have sex

meta.specific: 仕事をやる - to do work

title: 八日
a: eight days, the eighth (day of the month)

meta.specific: よく行く - to go often
よくできる - can do well

title: 四日
a: four days, the fourth (day of the month)

title: 渡す
a: to pass over, to hand over

title: 渡る
a: to cross over, to go across
